00045  *   Called automatically on USB Reset Event
00046  */

00111 /*
00112  *  USB Set Configuration Event Callback
00113  *   Called automatically on USB Set Configuration Request
00114  */
00115 
00116 #if USB_CONFIGURE_EVENT
00117 void USB_Configure_Event (void) {
00118 
00119   if (USB_Configuration) {                  /* Check if USB is configured */
00120     GetInReport();
00121     USB_WriteEP(0x81, &InReport, sizeof(InReport));
00122   }
00123 }
00124 #endif
00125

00148 
00149 #define P_EP(n) ((USB_EP_EVENT & (1 << (n))) ? USB_EndPoint##n : NULL)
00150 
00151 /* USB Endpoint Events Callback Pointers */
00152 void (* const USB_P_EP[16]) (uint32_t event) = {
00153   P_EP(0),
00154   P_EP(1),
00155   P_EP(2),
00156   P_EP(3),
00157   P_EP(4),
00158   P_EP(5),
00159   P_EP(6),
00160   P_EP(7),
00161   P_EP(8),
00162   P_EP(9),
00163   P_EP(10),
00164   P_EP(11),
00165   P_EP(12),
00166   P_EP(13),
00167   P_EP(14),
00168   P_EP(15),
00169 };
00170 
00171 
00172 /*
00173  *  USB Endpoint 1 Event Callback
00174  *   Called automatically on USB Endpoint 1 Event
00175  *    Parameter:       event
00176  */
00177 
00178 void USB_EndPoint1 (uint32_t event) {
00179 
00180   switch (event) {
00181     case USB_EVT_IN:
00182       GetInReport();
00183       USB_WriteEP(0x81, &InReport, sizeof(InReport));
00184       break;
00185   }
00186 }
00187 
00188 
00189 /*
00190  *  USB Endpoint 2 Event Callback
00191  *   Called automatically on USB Endpoint 2 Event
00192  *    Parameter:       event
00193  */
00194 
00195 void USB_EndPoint2 (uint32_t event) {
00196   switch (event) {
00197     case USB_EVT_IN:
00198       GetInReport();
00199       USB_WriteEP(0x82, &InReport, sizeof(InReport));
00200       break;
00201   }
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00205 /*
00206  *  USB Endpoint 3 Event Callback
00207  *   Called automatically on USB Endpoint 3 Event
00208  *    Parameter:       event
00209  */
00210 
00211 void USB_EndPoint3 (uint32_t event) {
00212   switch (event) {
00213     case USB_EVT_IN:
00214       GetInReport();
00215       USB_WriteEP(0x83, &InReport, sizeof(InReport));
00216       break;
00217   }
00218 }
